Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- TRANSFORMATION --- !
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
! --- DRY SPRINKLER --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed RESOL res*2/3 IF sprinklerType = 1 THEN ! Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.10 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.08
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT -dTWidth, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
REVOLVE 4, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0, dTDepth/2, 2, -thk, dTDepth/2, 2, -thk, diam/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2
ADD -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth, 0, -thk/2 PRISM_ 4,thk, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 79, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 79, -1, 0, 879, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1079 DEL 1
RESOL 6 ADDx -0.25 * dTWidth ROTy 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.5 * dTWidth GOSUB 100 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 2 THEN ! Pendent Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.06 dTDepth = 0.06 dTHeight = 0.06
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, -dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ADDz -0.15 * dTHeight CYLIND 0.15 * dTHeight, diam/2
RESOL 6 ROTy 90 forkW = diam forkL = 0.848 * dTHeight GOSUB 100 DEL 2
TOLER 0.001 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.005, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/6, dTWidth/2, 1001 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 3 THEN ! Recessed Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.075 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.08
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT -dTWidth, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
REVOLVE 5, 360, 2+16+32, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,diam/2, 2, 0, diam/2, 2
ADD -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth, 0, -thk/2 PRISM_ 4,thk, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 79, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 79, -1, 0, 879, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1079 DEL 1
RESOL 6 ROTy 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.75 * dTWidth GOSUB 100 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 4 THEN ! Recessed Pendent Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.08 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.05
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, -dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy -90 REVOLVE 5, 360, 2+16+32, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,diam/2, 2, 0, diam/2, 2 DEL 1
ADDz 0!-0.15 * dTHeight
RESOL 6 ROTy 90 forkW = 0.8*diam forkL = 0.98 * dTHeight GOSUB 100 DEL 2
TOLER 0.001 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.005, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/9, dTWidth/3, 1001 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 5 THEN ! Upright Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.06 dTDepth = 0.06 dTHeight = 0.06
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTx 180 ADDz -0.15 * dTHeight CYLIND 0.15 * dTHeight, diam/2
RESOL 6 ROTy 90 forkW = diam forkL = 0.848 * dTHeight GOSUB 100 DEL 2
TOLER 0.001 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.005, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/6, dTWidth/2, 1001 DEL 4 ENDIF ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple IF sprinklerType = 1 THEN ! Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.10 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.08
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT -dTWidth, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
REVOLVE 3, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0, dTDepth/2, 2, 0, diam/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2
ADDx -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth POLY_ 4, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 1, -1, 0, 879, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1001 DEL 1
RESOL 4 ADDx -0.25 * dTWidth ROTy 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.5 * dTWidth GOSUB 110 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 2 THEN ! Pendent Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.06 dTDepth = 0.06 dTHeight = 0.06
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, -dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ADDz -0.15 * dTHeight CYLIND 0.15 * dTHeight, diam/2
RESOL 4 ROTy 90 forkW = diam forkL = 0.848 * dTHeight GOSUB 110 DEL 2
RESOL 8 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.01, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/6, dTWidth/2, 1001 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 3 THEN ! Recessed Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.075 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.08
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT -dTWidth, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
REVOLVE 3, 360, 2+16+32, -0.25 * dTWidth,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2, 0, diam/2, 2
ADDx -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth POLY_ 4, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 1, -1, 0, 879, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1001 DEL 1
RESOL 4 ROTy 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.75 * dTWidth GOSUB 110 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 4 THEN ! Recessed Pendent Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.08 dTDepth = 0.08 dTHeight = 0.05
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, -dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3, 360, 2+16+32, -0.25 * dTWidth,dTDepth/2, 2, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 2, 0, diam/2, 2 DEL 1
ADDz 0!-0.15 * dTHeight
RESOL 4 ROTy 90 forkW = 0.8*diam forkL = 0.98 * dTHeight GOSUB 110 DEL 2
RESOL 8 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.01, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/9, dTWidth/3, 1001 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 5 THEN ! Upright Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.06 dTDepth = 0.06 dTHeight = 0.06
MUL A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth, ZZYZX/dTHeight
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT 0, 0, dTHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTx 180 ADDz -0.15 * dTHeight CYLIND 0.15 * dTHeight, diam/2
RESOL 4 ROTy 90 forkW = diam forkL = 0.848 * dTHeight GOSUB 110 DEL 2
RESOL 8 ADDz -dTHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 3,360, 1+16+32, 0, 0.01, 1, 0, 1, 801, dTWidth/6, dTWidth/2, 1001 DEL 4 ENDIF ENDIF
RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
DEL TOP
END
100: REVOLVE 4,360,1+2+16+32, 0, forkW/9, 2, 0.8*forkL, forkW/9, 2, 0.8*forkL, forkW/7, 2, forkL, forkW/7, 2 alpha = ATN((forkW/2 - forkW/7) / (0.2*forkL))
ADDz -0.025*forkW PRISM 6,0.05*forkW, 0, forkW/2, 0.8*forkL, forkW/2, forkL, forkW/7, 0.8*forkL, forkW/7, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), forkW/3, 0, forkW/3 PRISM 6,0.05*forkW, 0, -forkW/2, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/2, forkL, -forkW/7, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/7, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), -forkW/3, 0, -forkW/3 DEL 1 RETURN
110: REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+16+32, 0, forkW/8, 2, forkL, forkW/8, 2 alpha = ATN((forkW/2 - forkW/8) / (0.2*forkL))
POLY 6, 0, forkW/2, 0.8*forkL, forkW/2, forkL, forkW/8, 0.8*forkL, forkW/8, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), forkW/3, 0, forkW/3 POLY 6, 0, -forkW/2, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/2, forkL, -forkW/8, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/8, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), -forkW/3, 0, -forkW/3 RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100
unID = 1 IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane
! --- DRY SPRINKLER --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
IF sprinklerType = 1 THEN ! Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.10 dTDepth = 0.08
MUL2 A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT2 -dTWidth,0, unID: unID=unID+1
POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, dTDepth/2, 1, -thk, dTDepth/2, 0, -thk, diam/2, 1, -0.25 * dTWidth,diam/2, 1, -0.25 * dTWidth,-diam/2, 1, -thk, -diam/2, 0, -thk, -dTDepth/2, 1, 0, -dTDepth/2, 1 LINE2 -thk, dTDepth/2, -thk, -dTDepth/2
ADD2 -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth, 0 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 1, -1, 0, 801, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1001 DEL 1
ADD2 -0.25 * dTWidth,0 ROT2 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.5 * dTWidth GOSUB 100 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 2 THEN ! Pendent Dry Sprinkler IF gs_symbtype_2D_m = 1 OR gs_symbtype_2D_m = 2 THEN ! Realistic, Electric POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 901, A/2,360,4001 ENDIF IF gs_symbtype_2D_m = 3 THEN ! RCP HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 CIRCLE2 0, 0, A/2 END ENDIF ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 3 THEN ! Recessed Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler dTWidth = 0.075 dTDepth = 0.08
MUL2 A/dTWidth, B/dTDepth
thk = 0.05*dTDepth diam = 0.5*dTDepth
HOTSPOT2 -dTWidth,0, unID: unID=unID+1
POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.25 * dTWidth,dTDepth/2, 1, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,dTDepth/2, 0, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,diam/2, 1, 0, diam/2, 1, 0, -diam/2, 1, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,-diam/2, 0, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,-dTDepth/2, 1, -0.25 * dTWidth,-dTDepth/2, 1
LINE2 -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,dTDepth/2, -0.25 * dTWidth+thk,-dTDepth/2
ADD2 -dTWidth+0.25 * dTWidth, 0 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1, 0,-0.25 * dTWidth, 1, -1, 0, 801, 0, 0.25 * dTWidth, 1001 DEL 1
ADD2 -0.25 * dTWidth,0 ROT2 180 forkW = diam forkL = 0.5 * dTWidth GOSUB 100 DEL 3 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 4 THEN ! Recessed Pendent Dry Sprinkler IF gs_symbtype_2D_m = 1 OR gs_symbtype_2D_m = 2 THEN ! Realistic, Electric diam = 0.5*B POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 901, A/2,360,4001 CIRCLE2 0,0, diam/2 ENDIF IF gs_symbtype_2D_m = 3 THEN ! RCP HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 CIRCLE2 0, 0, A/2 END ENDIF ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 5 THEN ! Upright Dry Sprinkler POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 901, A/2,360,4001 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData DEL 2 ELSE HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[5][1], outCoords[5][2], unID: unID=unID+1
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ENDIF
END
100: POLY2_B 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, forkW/9, 1, 0.8*forkL, forkW/9, 0, 0.8*forkL, forkW/7, 1, forkL, forkW/7, 1, forkL, -forkW/7, 1, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/7, 0, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/9, 1, 0, -forkW/9, 1 LINE2 0.8*forkL,-forkW/7, 0.8*forkL,forkW/7
alpha = ATN((forkW/2 - forkW/7) / (0.2*forkL))
POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, forkW/2, 1, 0.8*forkL, forkW/2, 1, forkL, forkW/7, 1, 0.8*forkL, forkW/7, 1, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), forkW/3, 1, 0, forkW/3, 1 POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, -forkW/2, 1, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/2, 1, forkL, -forkW/7, 1, 0.8*forkL, -forkW/7, 1, 0.8*forkL-(forkW/6)/TAN(alpha), -forkW/3, 1, 0, -forkW/3, 1 RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
!-----------Основной--------------------- success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name ! Dry Sprinkler
EPS = 0.0001
DIM type_dim[5] type_dim[1]=`Настенное Крепление` type_dim[2]=`Подвесной` type_dim[3]=`Встроенный Горизонтальный` type_dim[4]=`Встроенный Подвесной` type_dim[5]=`Вертикальный`
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "sprinklerTypeStr" THEN IF sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[1] THEN sprinklerType = 1 IF sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[2] THEN sprinklerType = 2 IF sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[3] THEN sprinklerType = 3 IF sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[4] THEN sprinklerType = 4 IF sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[5] THEN sprinklerType = 5 PARAMETERS sprinklerType = sprinklerType ENDIF
IF sprinklerTypeStr <> type_dim[sprinklerType] THEN sprinklerTypeStr = type_dim[sprinklerType] PARAMETERS sprinklerTypeStr = sprinklerTypeStr ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
! --- dirAngOnXYPlane of the route --- !
IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN arCosVal = MEP_Position[3][1]/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal)-90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[3][2]) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 180-dirAngOnXYPlane ENDIF
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1+gs_Connections[1][4]*ConLength_1, ConPosY_1+gs_Connections[1][5]*ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+gs_Connections[1][6]*ConLength_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT 0, 0, 0 IF sprinklerType = 1 THEN ! Horizontal Sidewall Sprinkler PUT -A, 0, 0 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 2 THEN ! Pendent Dry Sprinkler PUT 0, 0, -ZZYZX ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 3 THEN ! Recessed Horizontal Sidewall Dry Sprinkler PUT -A, 0, 0 ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 4 THEN ! Recessed Pendent Dry Sprinkler PUT 0, 0, -ZZYZX ENDIF
IF sprinklerType = 5 THEN ! Upright Dry Sprinkler PUT 0, 0, ZZYZX ENDIF
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1]+MEP_Position[1][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2]+MEP_Position[1][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3]+MEP_Position[1][3] NEXT cnum
z = MEP_Position[1][3]
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[5][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = `Ширина` ui_set_str[2][1] = `Длина` ui_set_str[3][1] = `Высота` ui_set_str[4][1] = `Длина Соединения` ui_set_str[5][1] = `Тип Спринклера`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "A" ui_set_str[2][2] = "B" ui_set_str[3][2] = "ZZYZX" ui_set_str[4][2] = "ConLength_1" ui_set_str[5][2] = ""
DIM ui_set_attr[7][9] FOR i = 2 TO 7 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
ui_set_attr[6][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[6][2] = 1 ui_set_attr[6][3] = 15 ui_set_attr[6][4] = 46 ui_set_attr[6][5] = 100 ui_set_attr[6][6] = 65 ui_set_attr[6][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[6][8] = 0 ui_set_attr[6][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[1] ui_con_type[1] = 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_INFIELD{3} "sprinklerTypeStr", 15, 65, 172, 70, 2, 1, 6, 2, 70, 70, 60, 60, 1,type_dim[1],type_dim[1], 2,type_dim[2],type_dim[2], 3,type_dim[3],type_dim[3], 4,type_dim[4],type_dim[4], 5,type_dim[5],type_dim[5] ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
CALL "MEP_m_RequestPlanViewGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_symbtype_2D_m
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "MainBoxMaterial" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
IF sprinklerType = 1 OR sprinklerType = 3 OR sprinklerType = 5 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_symbtype_2D"
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "A" RANGE [ConWidth_1,] VALUES "B" RANGE [ConWidth_1,] VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [ConWidth_1,] ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
VALUES "sprinklerType" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 VALUES "sprinklerTypeStr" type_dim
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 1
! --- WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Подключение Воды`
IF (sprinklerType = 1 OR sprinklerType = 3) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "B" THEN ZZYZX = B PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ZZYZX ENDIF IF ABS(ZZYZX - B) > EPS THEN B = ZZYZX PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0 ENDIF
IF (sprinklerType = 2 OR sprinklerType = 4) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "B" THEN A = B PARAMETERS A = A ENDIF IF ABS(A - B) > EPS THEN B = A PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0 ENDIF
IF (sprinklerType = 5) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "B" THEN A = B PARAMETERS A = A ENDIF IF ABS(A - B) > EPS THEN B = A PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0 ENDIF
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, A) PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
Symbol.Comment: Сухой разбрызгиватель с различными типами насадок и со сварным или фланцевым соединением.
Symbol.Keywords: горизонтально сбоку, подвесной, встраиваемый горизонтально, встраиваемый подвесной, вертикально
